fullName: /api GET /user When asked for existing users, Then should retrieve and receive 200 response along with existing fields
/api When asked for existing users, Then should retrieve them and receive 200 response
When asked for one specific user by id, Then should retrieve it and receive 200 response
When asked for a non-existent user by id, Then should retrieve error and receive 404 response
When asked for a user by non-valid number id, Then should retrieve error and receive 400 response
When asked for a user by non-valid number id, Then should retrieve error and receive 400 response
